data.title: Great for quick lunch
data.text: Food above average. Parking is easy with big lot. People nice. Best fast food restaurant in area.  Burgers, fries & shakes all good.  Nice & clean place

data.title: Nice burgers
data.text: This one is all over the Bay area. It's a nice chain, to the point, no fuss , nothing fancy just good old fashioned burgers and fries. Easy menu, just tasty overall. Definitely a good choice of fast food.

data.title: Burger day
data.text: Another burger restaurant. A good place to get burger for a quick bite. also offer drive through service.

data.title: The best fast food chain burger under $20
data.text: Got here late night. Rushed off the plane to come and get some. I got a Double Double, animal style, another Double Double with grilled onions, animal style fries. The wife got a cheeseburger with grilled onions. These are must gets from the chain. This location in particular is extremely busy. Don't mind the wait, it really isn't that long either. The drive thru line is especially crazy though. Service is always good. There is something with their training that gets them to be superior at their jobs. Never had bad service at In-N-Out.

data.title: Great burger, awful fries
data.text: I live on the East Coast and had been wanting to try and In-n-Out Burger for a decade. As Anthony Bourdain recommended, I ordered it Animal-Style. The burger did not disappoint. It was fantastic. I loved it, but as great as the burger was, the fries were awful. I am not sure if they are always that awful, but mine were an undercooked mess. Long line too.

data.title: Dependable Good Burgers
data.text: It's In-N-Out!  Same dependable good quality at all the restaurants.  We stopped here to get some burgers after coming in very late from out of town.  This place was very busy for being close to mid-night.  The drive-thru line was wrapped all the way around the streets.  We decided it was better to park and order inside.  The line to order inside was also going out the door, but the line moved with decent speed and the orders were completed within a reasonable time.  So just be prepare for some wait time and the long lines.  The burgers were tasty, especially when hungry from traveling.

data.title: Insanely overhyped
data.text: I not sure why people rave about this place or why there was a line out the door. The burger is a step over a big mac but that's not saying much. The fries were awful, possibly the worst fast food fries I've had and the "animal fries"  weren't any better.  The only redeeming quality this place has is the low prices, otherwise It would be a 1  star review.

data.title: Packed
data.text: Best time to eat here would be as soon as they open, they get very packed easily specially at night, but then again its in n out, they staff is friendly.

data.title: great burgers
data.text: Southern California burger chain. You won't find one of these on the East Coast. Great juicy burgers. So-so fries. Decadent shakes. This place in Daly City is insanely popular. Long drive-thru lines. Also very crowded when you walk in the door, but staffed by enthusiastic young people. Lines inside move fast.

data.title: Busy, Busy
data.text: In-N-Out Burger has lost its luster for me.  Burger bun is small.  Hamburger patties small.  Fresh cut potato fries too thin for my liking.  Lack of choices.  Usually long lines despite many workers.  Parking is tight.

data.title: IN addition with a  full stomach and a big smile all ... with IN and OUT style and brand
data.text:
Arrived  with a friend that has never been to IN and Out  while we were on holiday in San Francisco Area
Simple menu ordered and we order #64 ... they were serving #.s in low 20ies .

We picked up our order in 13 mins from time ordered , which I felt was fast and in order with how busy they were ... faster that Jack in the box with only 2 ahead of me.

Food was correct served at correct temps. and no errors

We were very pleased and left smiling

data.title: Quick Burger Lunch
data.text: Kids clamor for the In-N-Out Burger and off we went to this Daly City branch. We love the simple menu choices; more so, the low prices of their burgers. Freshly made burgers came out after a short wait and we enjoyed eating them. We make it a point to stop at an In-n-Out store when we are on a road trip.

data.title: Just Okay
data.text: Maybe my expectations were too high, but I didn't think these burgers were worth the hype. Being that I'm from the midwest, I was expecting a burger like Culver's. These patties were smaller and just didn't have the same taste. I just don't understand why it was so crowded. That was my first and last visit to this chain

data.title: Got my fix
data.text: Just got off the airplane starving to death looking for something so I GPS the nearest In-N-Out wasn't disappointed usual fast service and great burger and fries wish they had them where I live

data.title: You know its good when see a long line every time you go!
data.text: So not much to say about this place because it is already well known, but the bad thing is why is it always pack!!! i know it is good food, but i just wish once that i got there, it be like done in 5 minutes. However to be fair, for the amount of people they do get the order done in a reasonable time. So can't really complain, just that sometimes don't want to wait :D

data.title: The Burgers are Fantastic, We Prefer the Fries Animal Style!
data.text:
We stop by this location occasionally on the weekends.  It is always busy and and I've never seen it slow.  The menus at In-N-Out restaurants are somewhat limited, but the items burgers they serve are super.  I believe they do a grilled cheese sandwich as well.  We're not big fans of the regular fries but they do have an off the main menu preparation called Animal Style.  You can get both burgers and fries prepared this way.  Basically they add grilled onions, melted cheese and thousand island dressing to the fries or burgers.  It is yummy!

In-N-Out is very affordable and they have great shakes too,  They drive through is always packed but they do have a nice sized parking lot that we can usually find a spot to park.  We really like the burgers here.

data.title: In-n-out burgers
data.text: I thought the staff was friendly, but the limited choice of food was poor. If i need to get a quick bite i will not go back to this place.

data.title: Safe food
data.text: Hamburgers were big enough, fried potato fresh, clean and safe. What else? Since so many people likes this place it is crowded therefore we wait a little bit more than the others. It is a safe place to go with your family and young students were like this place. I advise my children eating their fast food here.

data.title: solid good burger all the time!
data.text: if you never have in-n-out burgers before, it is a must!  prepare to wait but it is well worth the long wait, try to get there right around they open, is the best time and the wait might be not as long.

data.title: When in doubt, in n out
data.text: You can never go wrong with having an in n out burger. Freshly made burgers that you can see being made right in front of you. We all order differently, I prefer the double-double ,animal stylesheets  (grilled onions and pickles) with an extra patty.
